bookTitle: The Selected Writings of Edgar Allan Poe
bookAuthors: Edgar Allan Poe, Gary Richard Thompson
Plot: Thompson (English and comparative literature, Purdue U.) relies on Poe's original works as they were first published, solving the problem of Poe's rewriting habit. Among his selections Thompson includes poems, tales and sketches, The Narrative of Arthur Gordon Pym and passages from Eureka: An Essay in the Material and Spiritual Universe.
